extendedInfo.description: Bangkok's No.1 Night tour. The Bangkok Hangover. Visit the Bars featured in the movie Hangover2 as well as other popular bars, including bars with the best live shows, the infamous ladyboy bars and lots more... There is even a bar where you can ride a mechanical bull!We take all the stress and hassle out of the experience for you. This is a private tour with pick up and drop off at your hotel.Your guide has many years of experience and knows which are the best bars and which to avoid.The tour is ideal for large groups and bachelor nights, stag/bucks nights as we take care of everything for you. luxury private Transport, guides, checking the bar bills. We can arrange special embarrassing events for the groom and generally take the stress out of it for you. The tour is popular with couples and girls who want to see what goes on but don't want to be hassled or pestered.  We keep the touts and rip offs away from you.Hangover movie buffs are also welcome on the tour and we have lots of info on where all the filming took place. As well as other movies that have been filmed around the nightlife areas.The Tour:7.30 pm  â¨Private pick up at your hotel8.00 -9.15pmâ¨ Visit the Bars Featured in the movie Hangover2. The Tilac and Cactus Bars plus one of the most popular Bars in Thailand-featuring the infamous glass ceiling.9.30-10.30pmâ¨ The tour moves on to another popular nightlife area where you will get to experience  a bar frequented by the actors from the movie which has some great live shows. We then visit one of Bangkok's most famous ladyboy bars as well as the option of riding a mechanical bull!11.00- 12pm â¨We finally move to the 3rd and final area of the tour for some more crazy live shows . (Pat Pong!)MIDNIGHTâ¨At this point we can return you to your hotel or take you to a late night club where you can party on through the night.NOTES:â¨We get you 3 free drinks on the tour. After that you  must pay for your own drinks but we get you a VIP discont of 20% off in all the bars. One free drink is included at the speical live show (Pat Pong).  Late night clubs are extra (around 250 bht entrance -includes one drink) â¨Taking pictures inside the bars is prohibited unless we say its ok.  Some bars allow us some bars will not.You can get a feel of tour on our Facebook page with over 40,000 Fans, www.facebook.com/bangkokhangover
